name: places/ChIJP6d5B1ZYwokR_egf6gnUcAg
formattedAddress: 729 7th Ave 12th Fl, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 729 7th Ave 12th Fl, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
I wish I took the other negative reviews more seriously before coming here. I thought because the doctor was highly rated it would be ok. I wasn’t even able see the doctor because of the staff at the front desk. Came all the way out here for nothing, in addition to having to take time off to actually complete this appointment next week. They had no empathy or compassion, and just acted like they were on a power trip satisfied to be arguing and turning people away.

People remember how you made them feel.

Save yourself the frustration, don’t ruin your day by going here where people will be rude to you. It’s better to find another clinic where you will be treated more kindly with consideration, that’s what I am doing instead of trying to reschedule here.

originalText.text: I was 9 minutes late to an appointment today because I was stuck underground on the subway. The first thing the receptionist said to me is “You are 10 minutes late.” They refused to see me, even when I nicely said I would wait. I took off work to make this appointment. I’ve been waiting for over two months for this appointment. I explained all this calmly. I’ve never had this experience anywhere. Absolutely ridiculous and incredibly rude. They said this was their policy. I will never be going here again and I will not recommend to anyone I know.

originalText.text:
The staff is rude, unresponsive, and disorganized.

I had a prescription emergency where I ran out.  They refused to fill it unless I had a visit with the doctor.  The next appointment was in 3 months.  They told me to go to the ER if I could not wait.

Another time I showed up at 8:35AM for an 8:30AM appointment.  I was told they had a strict 3 minute policy.  They were laughing.

Avoid this disaster of an office.  They are completely unprofessional.

originalText.text: I waited 5 months for my appointment because they were so booked, and then the day I got there they had canceled my appointment without telling me. When I told them I never canceled the appt and wanted to see the doctor because I had waited for so long, they refused to help me. Health care is difficult enough without having to deal with mistakes and obstinance. I will be looking for a kinder and more competent doctor’s office.

text.text: I waited 5 months for my appointment because they were so booked, and then the day I got there they had canceled my appointment without telling me. When I told them I never canceled the appt and wanted to see the doctor because I had waited for so long, they refused to help me. Health care is difficult enough without having to deal with mistakes and obstinance. I will be looking for a kinder and more competent doctor’s office.

originalText.text: This place is horrible. Was charged almost $700 for an office visit with Dr. Joey Fernandez. When I called the front desk to ask for a reasoning as to why it was so high they yelled at me, mocked me, and provided absolutely no help. Not only that, but instead of explaining the breakdown of the visit costs, they came up with additional excuses like that it was because I was evaluated under sports medicine instead of internal medicine, something that I was not aware of when I made the appointment, or that I must have received additional treatment outside of what I was there for when I did not. I still am unable to determine the actual reasoning as to why my visit was billed this high when my expected cost was around $300. It's really disheartening as I was originally supposed to be seeing Dr. Samantha Stimmel who I heard nothing but great things about, but had to make an additional appointment with Dr. Fernandez in the interim. Unfortunately, I've cancelled my original appointment with Dr. Stimmel and will not be returning due to the disrespect that I received from the office staff.
